title: 服务器崩溃
author: 殇蚀烬月
txt_content:
[Pterodactyl Daemon] Server marked as STARTING
[Pterodactyl Daemon] Checking size of server data directory...

OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 25.212-b01, mixed mode)
:/home/container$ java -Xmx2000M -jar server.jar
Error: Unable to access jarfile server.jar

OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 25.212-b01, mixed mode)

Error: Unable to access jarfile server.jar

replies.author: 殇蚀烬月
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-1-13 15:21
找不到这个 server.jar
为什么服务器可以正常运行但插件无法使用，是server.jar这个文件的问题吗
